text.div:
Generated Narrative: CodeSystem behavioral-biomarker-cs

This case-sensitive code system http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/aerospace/CodeSystem/behavioral-biomarker-cs defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
cortisol-ugdl Cortisol (µg/dL)Cortisol concentration used as a stress biomarker.
hrv-ms Heart rate variability (ms)Root-mean-square or similar measure of HRV in milliseconds.
sleep-duration-h Sleep duration (hours)Total nightly sleep duration in hours.
sleep-efficiency-pct Sleep efficiency (%)Percentage of time in bed spent asleep.
awakenings-count Nocturnal awakenings (count)Number of awakenings during sleep period.
speech-stress-index Speech stress indexDerived metric from speech prosody indicating stress level.
activity-level Activity levelGross motor activity level from accelerometry.
reaction-time-ms Reaction time (ms)Reaction time in milliseconds from vigilance or cognitive tests.

name: BehavioralBiomarkerCS
title: Behavioral Biomarker Code System
description: Codes for physiologic and digital biomarkers related to behavioral health and stress.

concept.definition: Cortisol concentration used as a stress biomarker.
Root-mean-square or similar measure of HRV in milliseconds.
Total nightly sleep duration in hours.
Percentage of time in bed spent asleep.
Number of awakenings during sleep period.
Derived metric from speech prosody indicating stress level.
Gross motor activity level from accelerometry.
Reaction time in milliseconds from vigilance or cognitive tests.
